welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cholula de Rivadabia, Mexico! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's vibrant culture, stunning architecture, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Cholula has to offer.

restaurants.name: Molotes Tepox
restaurants.description: Molotes Tepox is a mexican restaurant located in San Pedro Cholula.

restaurants.name: El Asadero
restaurants.description: El Asadero is a bbq joint located in San Pedro Cholula.
restaurants.address: Av. Miguel Hidalgo, 72760 San Pedro Cholula, Puebla

restaurants.name: Pozolería Chapala
restaurants.description: Pozolería Chapala is a mexican restaurant located in San Andrés Cholula.
restaurants.address: 2 Norte 1001 (10 Oriente), 72810 San Andrés Cholula, Puebla

restaurants.name: Taqueria El Corralito
restaurants.description: Taqueria El Corralito is a taco restaurant located in San Pedro Cholula.

restaurants.name: Cemitas Lupita
restaurants.description: Cemitas Lupita is a mexican restaurant located in San Pedro Cholula.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hermanos Serdan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
